data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S5 mini w/ LineageOS 14.1
data.expected_result: The search options should be always showned
data.short_description: Search options (example from: mention:) disappears when you type something and switch theme (sometimes is needed to repeat the steps)
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable the theme client sync. - Go into any server and search for something on the android device. - On the computer switch theme.
